values.description: Build and test Express app, scan with SonarQube and Trivy, build/push Docker image.
values.name: express-app-build

source.buildspec:
version: 0.2

phases:
  install:
    runtime-versions:
      nodejs: 16
    commands:
      - echo Installing dependencies...
      - npm install
      - npm install -g sonar-scanner
      - curl -sfL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aquasecurity/trivy/main/contrib/install.sh | sh -s -- -b /usr/local/bin
  pre_build:
    commands:
      - echo Logging in to Amazon ECR...
      - aws ecr get-login-password --region $AWS_DEFAULT_REGION | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $REPOSITORY_URI
      - echo Running SonarQube scan...
      - sonar-scanner -Dsonar.projectKey=$CODEBUILD_SOURCE_REPO_URL -Dsonar.sources=.
      - echo Running Trivy scan...
      - trivy fs .
  build:
    commands:
      - echo Building the Docker image...
      - docker build -t $REPOSITORY_URI:latest .
      - docker push $REPOSITORY_URI:latest
      - printf '[{"name":"%s","imageUri":"%s"}]' "${APP_NAME}" "$REPOSITORY_URI:latest" > imagedefinitions.json
  post_build:
    commands:
      - echo Build completed on `date`
artifacts:
  files:
    - imagedefinitions.json

values.description: Allow HTTP/HTTPS inbound traffic to ALB
values.name: express-app-alb-sg

values.description: Allow traffic from ALB to ECS
values.name: express-app-ecs-sg

after.description: Build and test Express app, scan with SonarQube and Trivy, build/push Docker image.
after.name: express-app-build

after.description: Allow traffic from ALB to ECS
after.name: express-app-ecs-sg

description.constant_value: Build and test Express app, scan with SonarQube and Trivy, build/push Docker image.
Allow HTTP/HTTPS inbound traffic to ALB
Allow traffic from ALB to ECS

aws_region.description: AWS region to deploy resources in.

container_port.description: Port the Express app listens on.

private_subnet_cidrs.description: List of private subnet CIDR blocks.

public_subnet_cidrs.description: List of public subnet CIDR blocks.
